1.0.0.name: i18next-http-backend
1.0.0.description: i18next-http-backend is a backend layer for i18next using in node.js, in the browser and for deno.

scripts.compile: rm -rf cjs && mkdir cjs && babel lib -d cjs --presets=@babel/preset-env --plugins=add-module-exports && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > cjs/package.json
scripts.browser: browserify --standalone i18nextHttpBackend cjs/index.js -o i18nextHttpBackend.js && uglifyjs i18nextHttpBackend.js --compress --mangle -o i18nextHttpBackend.min.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run browser
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:fetch && npm run test:xmlhttpreq
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push

scripts.compile:esm: rm -rf esm && mkdir esm && BABEL_ENV=esm babel lib -d esm && cp lib/getFetch.cjs esm/getFetch.cjs && rm -f esm/getFetch.js && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('esm/getFetch.cjs', fs.readFileSync('esm/getFetch.cjs').toString().replace('/* eslint-disable no-var, no-undef */\n', ''))"
scripts.compile:cjs: rm -rf cjs && mkdir cjs && BABEL_ENV=cjs babel lib -d cjs && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > cjs/package.json && cp lib/getFetch.cjs cjs/getFetch.js && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('cjs/getFetch.js', fs.readFileSync('cjs/getFetch.js').toString().replace('/* eslint-disable no-var, no-undef */\n', ''))" && node -e "fs.writeFileSync('cjs/request.js', fs.readFileSync('cjs/request.js').toString().replace('getFetch.cjs', 'getFetch.js'))"
scripts.compile: npm run compile:esm && npm run compile:cjs
scripts.browser: browserify --ignore cross-fetch --standalone i18nextHttpBackend cjs/index.js -o i18nextHttpBackend.js && uglifyjs i18nextHttpBackend.js --compress --mangle -o i18nextHttpBackend.min.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run browser
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:fetch && npm run test:xmlhttpreq
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run browser
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:fetch && npm run test:xmlhttpreq && npm run test:typescript
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build && git push

description: i18next-http-backend is a backend layer for i18next using in Node.js, in the browser and for Deno.
